questions.question_text: Satsangioe sadā sūrya ūgyā _______ jāgavu. Tyār bād snānādik karī shuddha vastro dhāran karavā. (51)
questions.explanation: According to Satsang Diksha Shlok 51, Satsangis should awaken before sunrise.

questions.question_text: Shuddhih sarvavidhā pālyā bāhyā chā'bhyantarā sadā | Shuddhi-priyah prasīdech-cha shuddhi-mati jane Harihi || 50 ||
questions.explanation: This is the first line of Satsang Diksha Shlok 50.

questions.question_text: Tyār bād pūrva dishāmā athavā uttar dishāmā mukh rākhī, shuddha _______ upar besī nitya-pūjā karavī. (52)
questions.explanation: According to Satsang Diksha Shlok 52, one should sit on a clean seat for daily puja.

questions.question_text: Bhagwanne bhajavā ethī bījī vāt moţī nathī.
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Jetalpur 5.

questions.question_text: Swāminārāyan mantrano jāp karatā tathā gurunu smaran karatā karatā _______ vishe Bhagwānnā pūjāthī prasādībhūt thayel chandan vade ūrdhva-pundra tilak karavu ane kumkum vade chāndalo karavo tathā chhātī ane banne bhujão par chandanthī tilak-chāndalo karavo. (53-54)
questions.explanation: According to Satsang Diksha Shlok 53-54, Tilak is applied on the forehead.

questions.question_text: Satsangibhih praboddhavyam pūrvam sūryodayāt sadā | Tatah snānādikam krutvā dhartavyam shuddha vastrakam || 51 ||
questions.explanation: This is the first line of Satsang Diksha Shlok 51.

questions.question_text: Strīoe Bhagwān tathā gurunu smaran karatā bhālne vishe kevaļ _______ chāndalo karavo. Tilak na karavu. (55)
questions.explanation: According to Satsang Diksha Shlok 55, women should apply a kumkum chandlo.

questions.question_text: Tyār bād pūrva dishāmā athavā uttar dishāmā mukh rākhī, shuddha āsan upar besī nitya-pūjā karavī. (52)
questions.explanation: This is the meaning of Satsang Diksha Shlok 52.

questions.question_text: Bāhya ane antarik em sarva _______ shuddhinu pālan karavu. Shrīharine shuddhi priya chhe ane shuddhivāļā manushyanī upar teo prasanna thay chhe. (50)
questions.explanation: According to Satsang Diksha Shlok 50, all types of purity should be observed.

questions.question_text: Kevalam chandrakah strībhih kartavyas-tilakam na hi | Kumkuma dravyato bhāle smarantībhir harim gurum || 55 ||
questions.explanation: This is the first line of Satsang Diksha Shlok 55.
